---
title: "Visualize NBA data"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

scores <- read_csv(here::here("output/nba_cleaned.csv"))

elo <- read_csv(here::here("output/running_elo.csv"))

```

all elos over time

```{r}

ggplot(elo, aes(date, elo, group = team)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5)

```

by season

```{r}

ggplot(elo, aes(date, elo, group = team)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~season, scales = "free_x")

```

by team

```{r}
ggplot(elo, aes(date, elo, group = team)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~team)

```

check against 538 elo
